text_block_list.text:
It's a new day. I go looking for Agnes<n>Digital to follow up,
now that she's<n>had some time to think.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
...You there. What are you doing,<n>peeking into classrooms?
Trying to<n>observe students in their natural<n>habitat?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
Ahaha! Jokes aside, circumstantial<n>evidence suggests that
you might just<n>be the "Uma simp" trainer Digital<n>
mentioned.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
Oh. Is that to say you really are the<n>one, then? What a
coincidence.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
If you're looking for her, Digital left<n>for the train station.
She's probably<n>off in town buying Umamusume<n>
merchandise.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
Hmm. That trainer really has their<n>sights set on Digital.
She's run from<n>plenty of offers, but maybe... Hehe,<n>I'm
curious what she'll do.

I take Agnes Tachyon's tip and start<n>searching likely
stores.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: Hahaaah...

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
Those sleek, supple leggies, framed<n>so elegantly... by a
luscious green turf.<n>♪ Or these muscular legs, kicking up<n>
dirt with such power...

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
If I was gonna pick just one<n>photocard... But that'd be
dumb!<n>Obviously two is better than one!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
Aaaagh, praise the heavens above!<n>I'm so blessed to exist
in the same<n>timeline as all these radiant racing<n>
goddesses!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
That's it—I was granted this time so<n>that I could devote it to
Umas! I wasn't<n>meant to run alongside them, and it<n>was
selfish of me to act so parasocial!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: Huh, wh-who just... said that...

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
Uwaaagh?! F-fancy seeing you here.<n>You didn't, uh, happen
to overhear all<n>that, did you?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: Welp, you heard what you heard.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
But I need you to know I'm dead<n>serious! I mean, just think
about it!<n>Who am I? Who?!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
I'm Agnes Digital! The biggest<n>Umamusume enjoyer of all<n>
Umamusu-kind!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
Do you really think I could sacrifice<n>my oshis?! Do you
reeeally expect me<n>to pick just turf or dirt?!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: I can't, I legit just can't, okay?!It's like telling someone to playmandolin without a pick just 'cause they can go pickless on guitar as ifthat's even remotely the same thing!
choice_data_list: So, you'd rather run in neither to watch both?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: Exactly. I'm better off watchingeverything on live streams than loseout 'cause I got greedy with this irl nonsense.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: Sigh... I remember when I waslittle and saw a race on TV for the firsttime... It blew my mind!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
The fierce determination they brought<n>to the track. All the
stories behind their<n>motivations! The way it wasn't all<n>
sunshine and rainbows...

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: I saw true, pure resolve. And itseized my heart!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
I thought I was so lucky to be an<n>Umamusume myself. I
thought I was<n>born to run like them!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
If the track is where Umas shine the<n>brightest, then I wanted
to be there<n>drinking it all in and cheering them on!<n>I wanted
to contribute every way I<n>could!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
And I knew when I enrolled that<n>depending on which races I
picked,<n>there'd be races I couldn't watch in<n>person, but
even so—I told myself<n>making that sacrifice was proof of my<n>
own resolve.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
I steeled myself and entered Tracen.<n>But when I took my
first step on<n>campus...

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
"Kyaha," "Hehehe"... Everywhere I<n>turn, there were
Umamusume giggling<n>and smiling...

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
My oshis were physically right there.<n>I was looking at my
oshis irl in full<n>3D... I could hear their breathing, their<n>
heartbeats, their footsteps—and all in<n>surround sound!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
I finally understood... I was outside,<n>looking at real Umas
without a monitor<n>between us. And you know how I<n>felt?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: I just... I felt like my brain was gonna<n>EXPLODE!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
My illusions of resolve burst! Boom,<n>gone! I wasn't
prepared in the<n>slightest!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: The level of detail in real life is abillion times more than a screen! Andthen when you consider that I've gotaptitude for dirt and turf—

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: I can't decide! I want to run them<n>both so bad!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
So I've made up my mind not to pick<n>either. That's the most
I can possibly<n>manage as a fan!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
Got it? I'll never pick a side! I'll never<n>run one if it means
losing the other!

Agnes Digital's gone full-on<n>defensive, and it's pretty clear
she's<n>not going to change her mind. But<n>maybe...

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
So what's it gonna be? Can you<n>really afford to waste time
trying to<n>convince me? Shouldn't you be off<n>helping actual
racers?!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
Hahaha, looks like you can't argue<n>with that, huh? Now,
leave me alone<n>and—
choice_data_list: You've got more resolve than anyone!
You've got more resolve than anyone!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: ...I what?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
...Were you listening to any of what I<n>just said? I can't even
make one<n>entry-level decision.
choice_data_list: Because you've got the resolve not to!
Because you've got the resolve not to!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: Uhhh?

Thinking back, Agnes Digital had a<n>crazy amount of power
on the dirt<n>track, especially for someone her<n>size.

And then she turned around and<n>showed incredibly light,
precise<n>footwork on the turf.

She's been putting in double the<n>work to hone both styles,
so it'd be a<n>waste not to let that effort shine!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
Um... You're gonna have to run<n>whatever that was by me
again...

It's a bit of a wild idea, but I think<n>I've got a plan. I run it by
her, and...

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: WHAAAAAT?!
A few days later, the whole school's<n>abuzz with rumors.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Did you hear the news? About<n>Digital's tryouts!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
Of course I did! I can't believe her,<n>though. I've never heard
of something<n>like this before.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Why is she running in both the dirtand the turf tryouts?
